sources.title: The Green Scarf
sources.description: Title: The Green Scarf Summary: Maitre Deliot, (Michael Redgrave) convinced a deaf, dumb, and blind man accused of murder is innocent, battles in the courtroom to prove his innocence as well as find the real murderer. Directed by: George More O'Ferrall Actors: Production Company: B & A Productions Release Date: 28 January 1955 (Finland) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Maitre Deliot, (Michael Redgrave) convinced a deaf, dumb, and blind man accused of murder is innocent, battles in the courtroom to prove his innocence as well as find the real murderer.

metadata.Plot: Maitre Deliot (Sir Michael Redgrave), convinced a deaf, dumb and blind man accused of murder is innocent, battles in the courtroom to prove his innocence, as well as find the real murderer.
metadata.Actors: Michael Redgrave, Ann Todd, Leo Genn
